text: Edward Akika (born 18 July 1941) is a retired Olympic track and field athlete from Nigeria. He specialised in the hurdling and the long jump events during his career. Akika represented Nigeria at the 1964 Olympic Games. He claimed the gold medal for his native West African country in the men's long jump event at the 1965 All-Africa Games. ==References== * sports-reference Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian male hurdlers Category:Nigerian male long jumpers Category:Olympic athletes of Nigeria Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:African Games gold medalists for Nigeria Category:African Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1965 All-Africa Games
title: Edward Akika
